uvi.description:
scsi: lpfc: Fix list_add() corruption in lpfc_drain_txq()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.162 by commit 16bcbfb56d759c25665f786e33ec633b9508a08f. For more details please see the references link.
